content:
Code example extracted from Stack Overflow:

<build>
  <extensions>
    <extension>
      <groupId>org.apache.maven.wagon</groupId>
       <artifactId>wagon-ssh-external</artifactId>
       <version>1.0-alpha-5</version>
    </extension>
  </extensions>
</build>
Related APIs:
The answer uses 5 API classes, you can use the following links to see more code examples.

- javax.ws.rs.Path
- org.eclipse.core.runtime.Path
- android.graphics.Path
- org.apache.tools.ant.types.Path
- org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path
If you need more contextual information, you can go to the original post. This question was asked by Bmatthews68. You can go to his/her website. The accepted answer is provided by Rich Seller. Here is his/her website.
author: Java Code
title: Deploy artifacts from a Maven build to the SourceForge File Release System
